---
category: news
title: "Why Do AI Solutions In Manufacturing Remain At The Pilot Project Level?"
excerpt: "In contrast, introducing AI into manufacturing is a challenge. Integrating physical and chemical parameters, the sheer volume of data and the inherent responsibility associated with decision-making underscore the complexities. Because of these difficulties, many ambitious AI solutions often never pass the initial creation and testing stages."
